user_request: Show the shopping cart on amazon. Add "macbook air" to the cart on amazon
last_action: click on the product image (of a MacBook Air) of second search result located at the middle left
reflect_result: By clicking on the product image of the second search result (2017 Apple MacBook Air) in the previous screenshot, the user has been redirected to the product detail page. This action does not directly fulfill the user request, as the next necessary step would be to add the MacBook Air to the shopping cart. To progress toward the completion of the request, the user would need to locate the "Add to Cart" button on the product page and press it to add the item to their cart. This action is a step towards completing the request, but further action is required to fully add the MacBook Air to the cart.
